briefTitle: Reflux Esophagitis Phase III Study (Initial Treatment)
officialTitle: A Multicentre, Randomised, Double-blind, Parallel-group, Comparative Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Esomeprazole 20 mg and 40 mg Once Daily Oral Administration With Omeprazole 20 mg Once Daily Oral Administration in Patients With Reflux Esophagitis
summary: This study is to evaluate the efficacy of esomeprazole 20 mg once daily and 40 mg once daily for 8 weeks on healing of Reflux Esophagitis in patients with reflux esophagitis in comparison with omeprazole 20 mg once daily by assessment of presence/absence of Reflux Esophagitis at Week 8 according to the Los Angeles classification .

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Healing of Reflux Esophagitis (RE) Who Were Graded "O" at Week 8 Out of Patients Who Were Graded "A, B, C or D" at Baseline According to Los Angeles Classification".
